means: 使（自己）想起一时忘掉的事

sentence.Network_en: She could no longer recollect the details of the letter.
sentence.Network_cn: 她想不起那封信的细节了。

sentence.Network_en: He tried to recollect things and drown himself in them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他极力回想过去的事情而沉浸于回忆之中.

sentence.Network_en: Try hard to recollect what you saw before the accident.
sentence.Network_cn: 好好回想一下事故发生之前你看到的事情.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (in the sense 'gather'): from Latin recollect- 'gathered back', from the verb recolligere, from re- 'back' + colligere 'collect'
early 17th cent.: later form of recollect, from re- 'once more' + the verb collect

entry.def: If you recollect something, you remember it.

example.ex: Ramona spoke with warmth when she recollected the doctor who used to be at the county hospital...
example.tran: 拉蒙纳回忆起曾在乡村医院工作的那位医生时，言语中透着温情。

example.ex: His efforts, the Duke recollected many years later, were distinctly half-hearted.
example.tran: 据公爵许多年之后的回忆，他当时明显只是敷衍了事。

means.word_mean: 1. recall knowledge from memory; have a recollection;

sentences.sentence: "I can't remember saying any such thing"
"I can't think what her last name was"
"Do you remember that he once loved you?"

auth_sentence.content: I left about 5.30, as near as I can recollect.
auth_sentence.res_content: I left about 5.30, as near as I can recollect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I left about 5.30, as near as I can recollect.

auth_sentence.content: I recollect no work of any dignity which has been lately published.
auth_sentence.res_content: I recollect no work of any dignity which has been lately published.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I recollect no work of any dignity which has been lately published.

auth_sentence.content: If anything happens to me, recollect that death is a debt we must all pay.
auth_sentence.res_content: If anything happens to me, recollect that death is a debt we must all pay.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If anything happens to me, recollect that death is a debt we must all pay.

stems_affixes.word_buile: collect[v.收集]+ive……的→adj.集体的,共同的 n.集体

stems_affixes.value_cn: 智力的,理智的,有理解力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: intellect[n.理智,智力,才智]+ual……的→n.知识分子 adj.智力的,理智的,有理解力的
collect[v.收集]+ion表名词→n.收藏[品],收集[物]
collect[v.收集]+ive……的→adj.集体的,共同的 n.集体
elect[v.选举,推选;选择,作出选择]+ion表名词→n.选举,选择权;当选

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有选举权的人,选举人,竞选人
stems_affixes.word_buile: elect[v.选举,推选;选择,作出选择]+or人→n.有选举权的人,选举人,竞选人

stems_affixes.value_cn: [集合名词]精华;精锐;中坚分子;精英
stems_affixes.word_buile: el=elect[v.选举,推选;选择,作出选择]+ite人→选出的人→精英
intel=inter在……中间+lect选择,收集→在中间选出的人→智者
intellect[n.理智,智力,才智]+ual……的→n.知识分子 adj.智力的,理智的,有理解力的
recollect[v.回忆,想起,记起,忆起,记得]+ion表名词→n.回忆
select[v.选出]+ion表名词→n.选择,挑选;选集,精选物
acro高+lect讲,读,说→高层说的话
dia对着+lect讲,读,说→两个对着说→方言
idio个人的+lect说→个人说的话
neg没有+lect选择,收集→没有选出→疏忽
lect讲,读,说+ure表名词→n.&v.演讲,讲课
col共同+lect选择→放在一起选择→收集

stems_affixes.value_cn: 选举,推选;选择,作出选择
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+lect选择,收集→选出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 回忆,想起,记起,忆起,记得
stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+collect[v.收集]→重新收集[集中]→回想到
se分开+lect选→选出分开

sentences.en: I can’t recollect the exact words.
She could not recollect being there.
sentences.cn: 她回想不起曾经到过那儿。

sentences.en: I recollected that she had red hair.
Try hard to recollect what you saw before the accident.
sentences.cn: 好好回想一下事故发生之前你看到的事情。

sentences.en: I can’t seem to recollect where we met.
sentences.cn: 我似乎想不起我们在哪儿见过面。
